summary: Adds every power stone to Whiterun. Compatible with any Whiterun overhaul mods out there.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#6aa84f][size=5]What is This?
[/size][/color][/font][/center][center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=3]This mod adds all power stones out there to Whiterun, training area. I really loved making this.[/size]

[color=#6aa84f][size=5]How to Install?[/size][/color][/font][/center][center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=3]Automatically with manager or manually dragging it to your data folder.[/size][/font][/center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode]
[/font][center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#6aa84f][size=5]Q&A[/size][/color]
[/font][/center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=5]Q: [/size][size=3]What is the main purpose of this?
[/size][size=5]A: [/size][size=3]Personally I hate going/looking for these power stones so I put them all in one place. Didn't even know there were this many of them.Â 
[/size][size=3]Second reason is that these stones aren't challenging. You don't find them in dungeons or they're not being protected by bosses if I'm right.[/size][/font]
author: ProtologolusX
